title: #1574 OK, She's Lying
itunes:title: #1574 OK, She's Lying
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show by playing back a clip of this show from March 2020 as they attempt to examine the things they were pointing out then that still havent been addressed over two years later.  Adam also tells Drew about his fond memories of the rare road trip to Big Sur with his grandmother and the experiences that went along with those trips including a forgotten bottle of wine and a lie to a police officer. As the show wraps up they turn to the phones and take some listener phone calls.
